title: Belstaff Steve McQueen shirt font
content:
Hello,

I’am searching for this font. Especially for the number font.  
I think the letters and numbers are different fonts.

Many thanks  
Ryan

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [text.PNG](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210103100/http:/typophile.com/files/text.PNG) | 114.79 KB |

 [‹ Rodina Hotel font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210103100/http:/typophile.com/node/50169 "Go to previous forum topic") [NFL (american football) field font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210103100/http:/typophile.com/node/50160 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dontbugme

comments.content: STEVE McQUEEN is in [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210103100/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/futura_std_heavy/?sample_text=STEVE%20McQUEEN). The numbers are something else, perhaps hand drawn, but [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210103100/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_avant_garde_gothic_by_adobe_std_bold_cond/?sample_text=278&sample_size=74) comes close.
